content.raw:
Just one last thing, could you reduce this line to have less than 80 chars? If you run the code checker, it will show you the errors:

```
$ bash tools/code_check.sh 
./include/ignition/math/Vector3.hh:316:  Lines should very rarely be longer than 100 characters  [whitespace/line_length] [4]
./include/ignition/math/Vector3.hh:323:  Lines should very rarely be longer than 100 characters  [whitespace/line_length] [4]
Total errors found: 2
```
